name: Anbu (Captain)
effect:
Leaf | Anbu | Male | Mental Power: 2 | AMBUSH
[CAPTAIN OF THE ANBU]
Your opponent can't play Mission cards with an Entrance cost less than the number of your in-play "Anbu" Ninjas.
Valid: Your other "Anbu" Ninjas get +0/+1 and +1 Mental Power.
"Let's go, we have to backup Lord Hokagel. Beware of traps!"

name: Anko Mitarashi
effect:
Leaf | Genin | Female | Mental Power: 1 | GROWTH
[PUPIL OF OROCHIMARU]
Valid: When this Ninja is discarded due to the Showdown, you can search for 1 "Orochimaru" Ninja card in your Deck, reveal it, and place it in your hand. Then, shuffle your Deck.
"Lord Orochimaru…"

name: Bonds of Friendship
effect:
Effect: Draw 2 cards. Then, move 1 card from your hand to your Chakra area.
Effect: During your Mission Phase, if this card is in your Chakra area, you can remove it from game. In that case, place 1 Growth coin on a "Sand" or "Leaf" Ninja.
"Garra…" "Naruto…"

name: Byakugan
effect:
Target: 1 of your opponent's Battle Rewards
Effect: Turn the target face up. Then, randomly discard up to X cards from your opponent's hand. X = the number of Symbols on the target. (The target remains face up)
"I found them! There's one on a boulder about 500 meters northeast of here…"

name: Chakra Blades
effect:
Target: 1 Ninja
Effect: The target gets +0/+3.
"To activate it imagine your Chakra splitting in two…"

name: Choji Akimichi (Childhood)
effect:
Leaf | Ninja Academy Student | Male | Name: Choji Akimichi | GROWTH
[SNACK TIME]
When this Ninja is sent out to Attack, you can move 1 card from your Discard Pile to the bottom of your Deck. In that case, this Ninja gets +1/+1 during this turn.
"Hey, y'know I brought some snacks with me. You wanna share 'em?"

name: Danzo
effect:
Leaf | The Foundation | Male | Mental Power: 2
[HARD-LINER]
When this Ninja is put in play, your opponent moves all the cards in their hand to the bottom of their Deck in any order. Then, they draw cards equal to the amount moved minus one.
"That's been taken care of."

name: Dehydration
effect:
Counter Permanent (3)
target: 1 Ninja
Effect: Attach this card to the target. The effect text of the target is negated.
Effect: When your opponent draws 1 or more cards due to an effect, draw 1 card.

Errata:
Counter Permanent (3)
Target: 1 Ninja
Effect: Attach this card to the target. The effect text of the target is negated.
Effect: When your opponent draws 1 or more cards due to an effect, you can draw 1 card. [Link]
"Say, can we rest a bit?"

name: Ebisu
effect:
Leaf | Special Jonin | Male | Mental Power: 1
[MENTOR]
When this Ninja is Deployed, search your Deck for 1 Ninja card that includes "Childhood" in their name, reveal it, and place it in your hand. Then, shuffle your Deck.
When you put a Ninja in play by "Growth", heal it.
"I'm going to teach you how to walk…on water."

name: Expansion Jutsu: Super Slap!
effect:
Target: 1 Ninja with a Combat value less than or equal to the user's Combat value
Effect: The target becomes a Stand-by Ninja. Then, if the user has an Earth Symbol, it is unaffected by your opponent's Jutsu cards during this turn.
"Expansion Jutsu! Super Slap!"

name: Fierce Rivals
effect: Effect: The Combat, Support, and Mental Power of all Ninjas becomes 0 and cannot be changed by the effect of nin-Jutsu cards during this turn. At the end of this turn, draw 1 card for each of your Teams that won a Victory or Battle Reward during this turn.
"The truth is you and I are friends" "It's not insignificant to me, there is no question, you were my closest friend."

name: Fire Style: Fireball Jutsu
effect:
Target: 1 Ninja Battling against the user
Effect: Give 1 Damage to the target. Then, if the user has a Fire Symbol, discard 4 cards from the top or bottom of your opponent's Deck.
"Rat, Tiger, Dog, Ox, Hare, Tiger! Fire Style: Fireball Jutsu!!"

name: Gaara of the Desert (Childhood)
effect:
Sand | Male | Name: Garra of the Desert | SURGE
[LONELINESS]
When this Ninja is put in play, draw 1 card.
Valid: When this Ninja is discarded due to the Showdown, discard 1 card from your hand.
"What does pain feel like? You see I've never actually been injured before, and I was wondering what it was like."

name: Gamabunta
effect:
Leaf | Animal | Ninja Toad | MASTERY
[HEAD OF THE GAMA CLAN] When this Ninja is put in play, you can move up to X cards from your hand to your Chakra area. Then, move the same number of cards from the top of your deck to your hand. X = the number of your Ninjas with a "Lightning" Symbol.
Valid: While your opponent has less Chakra than you, this Ninja and your Turn Marker are unaffected by your opponent's Ninja and Jutsu effects.
"I'm the wise and powerfull Lord Gamabunta, the Chief Toad! .. And you're an idiot!"

name: Gamakichi
effect:
Leaf | Ninja Toad
[THE FIRST-BORN SON OF THE GAMA CLAN]
During your Mission Phase, you can discard 2 of your Battle Rewards. In that case, you can put 1 "Ninja Toad" Ninja in your hand in play ignoring the Entrance requirements.
Valid: This Ninja cannot be the user of Jutsu cards.
"Well, whatever it is, I hope you brought along some treats."

name: Giant Spider
effect:
Sound | Insect | Ambush
[RAIN OF SPIDERS]
Valid: When this Ninja is discarded due to the Showdown, you can remove all coins from 1 Ninja or Mission card.
"I warned you kid, however strong your defenses are I can find a way around them. Scatter!"

name: Haku
effect:
Mist | Rogue Ninja | Male
[CAMOFLAGE]
During the Mission Phase or the Exchange of Jutsu, you can injure another Ninja in this Ninja's Team. In that case, that Ninja cannot be the target of your opponent's Jutsu cards during this turn. Heal that injured Ninja at the end of the turn.
"If I hadn't intervened, you'd be dead now ... that much is certain."

name: Hayate Gekko
effect:
Leaf | Special Jonin | Male | Mental Power: 1 | Proctor

During your opponent's Mission Phase, you can negate and discard 1 of the Mission cards being played. In that case, discard this Ninja at the end of the turn.

name: Hinata Hyuga
effect:
Leaf | Chunin | Female | Mental Power: 1 | Byakugan | Main Branch | GROWTH
[FOR THE ONE SHE ADMIRES]
Valid: When your opponent searches or draws any cards due to an effect, your opponent discards 1 card from their hand. Then, you can draw 1 card and discard 1 card from your hand.
Errata:
Valid: When your opponent searches or draws any cards due to a Ninja or Ninja card, you can discard 1 card from their hand. Then, you can draw 1 card and discard 1 card. [Link]
"For a long time…I've trained as hard I could so Naruto would acknowledge my ability."

name: Hinata Hyuga (Childhood)
effect:
Leaf | Ninja Academy Student | Female | Mental Power: 1 | Name: Hinata Hyuga | Byakugan | Main Branch | GROWTH

Valid: When this Ninja is discarded due to the Showdown, move it to your Chakra area instead. In that case, randomly discard 1 card from your opponenet's hand.

name: Ino Yamanaka
effect:
Leaf | Chunin | Female | Mental Power: 1 | Medical | GROWTH
[PRESSING]
When this Ninja is put in play, you can reveal the top 2 cards of your Deck. If there are 1 or more Ninja cards among them, place 1 of them in your hand, return the rest and shuffle your Deck. Otherwise, return them to the top or bottom of your Deck in any order.
"Come on! He told us to hurry up!"

name: Ino Yamanaka
effect:
Leaf | Genin | Female | Mental Power: 1 | GROWTH

name: Iruka Umino
effect:
Leaf | Chunin | Male | Mental Power: 1

name: Isaribi
effect:
Sound | Female | Sea Monster

effect:
Leaf | Anbu | Jonin | Male | Name: Itachi Uchiha | Sharingan Eye | AMBUSH
[LEAF POLICE FORCE]
When this Ninja is deployed, you can discard all in-play non-Ninja cards.

name: Jiraiya
effect:
Leaf | Sannin | Male

effect:
Leaf | Jonin | Male | Sharingan Eye | Mental Power: 3

name: Kiba Inuzuka (Childhood)

Leaf | Ninja Academy Student | Male | Name: Kiba Inuzuka | Animal | GROWTH

Akatsuki | Rogue Ninja | Jonin | Male

effect:
Leaf | Genin | Male | Clone Status | GROWTH

effect: Effect: Search your Deck for 1 Ninja or Client with an Entrance cost less than the number of cards in your Chakra area, reveal it, and place it in your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.

Leaf | Jonin | Male

Leaf | Genin | Male | Clone Status

Sound | Rashomon | AMBUSH

name: Rock Lee
effect:
Leaf | Genin | Male | GROWTH

effect:
Leaf | Ninja Academy Student | Male | Name: Rock Lee | GROWTH

effect:
Leaf | Genin | Female | Mental Power: 3 | GROWTH

effect:
Akatsuki | Rogue Ninja | Jonin | Male | Mental Power: 3 | Puppet Master | AMBUSH

When one of your opponent's Ninja would be discarded, you can discard X of your Chakras, where X is the Entrance cost of that Ninja. In that case, move that Ninja cards to your Village instead.

name: Sasuke Uchiha
effect: Leaf | Genin | Male | Sharingan Eye | GROWTH

effect:

Leaf | Genin | Male | Mental Power: 4 | GROWTH

name: Shikamaru Nara (Childhood)
effect:
Leaf | Ninja Academy Student | Male | Mental Power: 3 | Name| Shikamaru Nara | GROWTH
[DREAMING OF THE DRIFTING CLOUDS]

name: Shino Aburame
effect:
Leaf | Genin | Male | Mental Power: 1 | GROWTH

name: Shizune
effect:
Leaf | Jonin | Female | Mental Power: 1 | Medical

name: Shogi Lesson
effect:
Target: 1 of your Ninjas
Effect: The target's Team and Team Battling against it performs a Mental Power Battle during this turn.
At the end of this turn, if the target was sent out to Battle this turn and is still in your Village, draw 2 cards.

name: Temari
effect:
Sand | Genin | Female | Mental Power: 1
[WIND CHARMER]

name: The Fourth Hokage
effect:
Leaf | Satoosa | Male | Mental Power: 2
[LIGHTNING SPEED]
Valid: When this Ninja's Team wins any Battle Reward, you can win 1 additional Battle Reward.
Valid: While this Ninja is Injured, this Ninja's Team cannot be blocked by a Team with only 1 Ninja.

effect:
Land of Birds | Female | Lady

name: Water Prison Jutsu
effect:

effect:
Leaf | Anbu | Male | Mental Power: 2 | AMBUSH

Mist | Anbu | Jonin | Male | Name: Zabuza Momochi | AMBUSH
